title: Bug 31627 - Core dump triggered on perspective change after adding DBCS project
description:
Language: Japanese
Build driver: eclipseSDKI20030211linuxgtk
OS: RedHat8 (Japanese: locale jaJP.eucJP), gtk 2.2
JDK Ver. : IBM JDK1.3.1 + SR3
Summary: DBCS: Perspective change caused core dump after adding DBCS project to the workspace
Description:
OB: Changing perspective to CVS after performing specific actions leads to a core dump.
EB: Perspective change should not trigger a core dump after adding a DBCS project to the workspace.
SR:
1. Create a project using DBCS characters.
2. Right-click the project and select 'Team > Share project...'
3. Select the CVS repository.
4. Choose 'Use project name as module name' and click 'Finish'.
5. Select the project in the Synchronize view.
6. Right-click on the project and choose 'Add Version Control'.
7. Right-click on the project and select 'Commit'.
8. Right-click on the project and choose 'Delete' (Select 'also delete contents under /workspace folder name').
9. Change the perspective to the CVS perspective.
10. Expand the repository and HEAD.
11. Right-click on the DBCS project and select 'Check Out As Project'.
